titleStmt.title: Several proposalls tendred to the considerations of the honorable committee for regulating of courts of justice, for a through reformation thereof, and the generall satisfaction of all the nation, save only some 20 or few more of the head officers; who being taken away, and these proposals granted, will save the Commonwealth many hundred thousand pounds in few yeeres.

Several proposalls tendred to the considerations of the honorable committee for regulating of courts of justice, for a through reformation thereof, and the generall satisfaction of all the nation, save only some 20 or few more of the head officers; who being taken away, and these proposals granted, will save the Commonwealth many hundred thousand pounds in few yeeres.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
